channel.title: Matrix 718 Client Friends List and Logout Menu
channel.description: I started using the Matrix 718 client/source recently and noticed that on the friends list tab it says "Matrix 1" at the top, also it says "Matrix" in the logout box. How do I get rid of this? I found an old post about this topic and it said to replace the names in clientscript and Icomponentdefinition but Iv'e already done so and it didn't change anything. And yes I compiled and everything (I'm not that bad at this lol). Any help is appreciated, I'm new to coding RSPS so go easy on me please.

item.title: Matrix 718 Client Friends List and Logout Menu
item.dc:creator: @mayhembro mayhembro
item.description:
@mayhembro wrote:

I started using the Matrix 718 client/source recently and noticed that on the friends list tab it says “Matrix 1” at the top, also it says “Matrix” in the logout box. How do I get rid of this? I found an old post about this topic and it said to replace the names in clientscript and Icomponentdefinition but Iv’e already done so and it didn’t change anything. And yes I compiled and everything (I’m not that bad at this lol). Any help is appreciated, I’m new to coding RSPS so go easy on me please.
